author: {'steamid': '76561198021993866', 'num_games_owned': 364, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1497056484}
review:
I honestly have no idea how this game has "Mostly Positive" user reviews; it's an unfinished piece of shit. I'll forgive the graphics since I'm not a graphics whore like most people, but everything else is equally unpolished.

The controls are sloppy as hell, making it difficult to complete otherwise simple missions. This is especially headache-inducing by the fact that there's literally no save feature, which means that, as soon as you exit the game, you have to start from the very beginning every time you play. Not to mention the fact that, if you're playing for the first time, you're going to spend more time trying to get in the damn cart than actually riding it.

The soundtrack is unbearable, consisting entirely of royalty-free butt rock that was probably composed by Kevin MacLeod. The game doesn't even have a custom graphic on the start-up options menu, and the icon is literally just the Unity icon (of course this shit was made in Unity).

This game's default price is 99 cents; I got it for 84, and even then, I still feel ripped off. You know what you can buy for 99 cents? A fucking soda, which would, without question, be a much better investment of your dollar than this. Not helped very well by the fact that there's hundreds of other indie games you can download from Steam for free that are better than this garbage.

1/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198133421081', 'num_games_owned': 22, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1497028041}
review:
1時間程でクリアしましたが、それなりに楽しめました。
まずカートにのるまでコツがいるので、もどかしくイライラする人には向かないかもしれません。
最後のステージなんかは根気がいりますのでがんばってください。
操作性もそこまで良いわけじゃないので、ちょっとやってみるかー的な感じなら良いんではないでしょうか・・・

author: {'steamid': '76561197962767542', 'num_games_owned': 3169, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1497011666}
review:
Bon allez ça faisait longtemps que je n'avais pas écris une critique. Bon déjà, quand on achète ce jeu 0,84€ (15% de remise), et qu'on voit les screens, on ne s'attend pas à une merveille.
Le concept m'a amusé, je me suis dis pourquoi pas ! Si c'est pas buggé de partout, ça peut-être fun !
Au final, il m'a fallu une heure pour le terminer, et il aura totalement réussi le contrat : me faire marrer.
4 niveaux, avec 3 objectifs différents, de plus en plus difficile.
Les niveaux sont plutôt bien modélisés pour le prix, et variés, une ville, une piste de ski, un bateau échoué, et un château fort. Ajoutez à cela une musique entraînante, bien qu'elle peut rapidement devenir lassante.
La physique n'est pas si degueu, après avoir joué à Mr.President!, la physique de Cart Racer sera un jeu d'enfant pour vous !
Côté succès il n'y en a que 13, et se deverouille assez facilement, bien que rejoindre le balcon de la princesse peut s'avérer compliqué ! Allez je l'ai fini en une heure, je suis curieux de savoir combien de temps vous mettrez!

Les + :
- Concept fun
- Pas de bug casse-pieds
- Une physique qui fait son job
- 4 niveaux variés
- Succès sympa
- Le prix d'une baguette

Les - :
- Musique répétitive

author: {'steamid': '76561198284954037', 'num_games_owned': 192, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 190, 'last_played': 1687927186}
review:
This is not a bad game for $0.99, but it dose have some issues. Atleast 3 out of every 4 attempts that I make fail because my jump dosent make it into the cart, or because I dont land far enugh into the cart and I fail lator down the run. If it automaticlly loaded you into the cart it would not be as bad.

Other than that I really  do like it. I have played it for sevral hours trying to make it to the end, but I am stuck at the very last part with over 1000 attempts on the last location.

I have gotten this far with about 1650 attempts, guessing that on avrage I used the "A" key 3 times per run (and I think that is fair) that is fair, that would be 2.5% of the rated life of that key on my $110 Corsair K70 Gaming keyboard.

So I think that for the cost this game is a great way to waste time, might work well to distract a kid.


YES! IT TOOK ANOTHER 72 ATTEMPTS BUT I FINNALLY WON!!! FUCK YEAH!

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198016081835', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1704631277}

author: {'steamid': '76561198025559236', 'num_games_owned': 2634, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 196, 'last_played': 1505569595}
review:
[b]これをゲームというのはゲームの定義に失礼だろう。[/b]
ストレス生成苦行ジェネレーターといったほうが正しい。
ショッピングカートに乗ってゴールポイントに触れるのが目的のゲームなのだが、カートに乗るのがかなり難しい。
まず操作するキャラなのだが、とにかく貧弱でその場にジャンプしても死ぬ、カートに当たると死ぬ、段差に触れると死ぬ…といったようにお前はスペランカー先生か？と言いたくなる。
なんとかカートに乗れて次のレベルに進むと、そこにはジャンプ台と目の前の建物の真ん中にゴールポイントが…
そう、極端に難易度を上げてくるのだ。
完全クリアした今でも最終面のクソさが思い出したくないぐらいで、(600近くのリトライ)途中から制作者を恨みたくなってくるほどにストレスを感じた。

もしコレを読んでいて買おうか迷っているのなら、その金で別のゲームをフレンドに投げつけている方が有意義だろう。

author: {'steamid': '76561198127113329', 'num_games_owned': 292, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1497323468}
review:
A very silly game with all the rag-doll physics you could want.

Controls are a bit wonky and the cart gets twitchy when you get up to speed.  Can be a bit frustrating trying the same approach over and over and over (and over).

The music is very repetative with no volume control or mute button.

However, biggest problem is that the game starts you from the beginning every time you play.  I played for roughly 20 minutes and needed a break from the music (and frustration).  Not sure I want to go through all the same levels again just to get back to where I was when I stopped...

It's silly for a bit of fun, but I wouldn't recommend paying for it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003842910', 'num_games_owned': 1342, 'num_reviews': 143, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1496760760}
review:
Als erstes muss ich sagen ich schreibe diese review mit sehr viel aggressionen!
Habe das spiel gekauft und losgelegt bin bis zum letzten level gekommen und nun nach 600 versuchen abgebrochen.
Meiner meinung nach gehört den entwicklern mal so richtig in die fresse getreten so einen scheissdreck rauszubringen.
Ausserdem keine speichermöglichkeiten.
Ich wette wer schon im letzten level und damit fast durch is es nie wieder anfassen wird.
Dieses spiel ist einfach nur dumm,und macht sehr aggressiv,ich empfehle niemanden nichtmal für 1 € diesen scheissdreck zu kaufen.
4 Spassige level? Von wegen arch geleckt,scheiss aggressiv machende dumme level inklusive nen total bescheuerten typ der einfach nur scheisse is.

Positiv : grafik is ok für 1€

negativ : einfach nur alles an diesem scheiss spiel.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984712587', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1496701933}
review:
First Impression Gameplay (Rage Warning): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e5M0NmXF6_U&feature=youtu.be

Ever play a game so terrible that you end up actually enjoying it?  Well that was Cart Racer for me.
It sort of reminds me of goat simulator without all the fun references and Easter eggs.

Basically your main objective is to jump into a shopping cart and steer it down a series of ever increasing hill challenges.  That might sound easy, but it took me several tries to just get into the shopping cart without face palming.  Once you actually make it into the cart, a combination of luck and skill comes into play.  Luck being how well your guy rag-dolls into the cart, as it seems weight distribution plays a part in maneuverability.  And skill because... well you're trying to steer a shopping cart.  

But seriously, this game is hard... 
It took me over 170 tries on the first stage alone.

Controls are a bit questionable (at least the part when you're trying to get into the cart), but overall workable if you're dedicated enough to learn through repeated failure.

Graphics are pretty sub standard, with minimalist level design.  Sound is nearly non-existent, other than the background music.  The background music is meh, with the Christmas stage having actual (and possibly copy-written) Christmas songs.  It plays on a loop (not a terribly short loop, but noticeable if you've been failing 70 attempts in a row).

And now we come to gameplay; the bread and butter of this title (and really the only reason anyone would want to play this).  The rag-doll physics are just hilarious (and very unpredictable).  Though something magical happens when you fail repeatedly to get into the cart, then you unexpectedly land a jump just perfectly...  and then you squeal with delight as you see the guys arms spread outward like Rose from the titanic, and his legs bent in an impossible, knee destroying angle.

My first time was almost euphoric, with the joy ending a mere 4 seconds later after getting T-boned by a sports car on an infinite loop.  It was like a heavy shot of dopamine which had me craving more.  Just one more attempt to get it right!

And that is why I can confidently recommend this terrible game.  
It's so bad that it's actually fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014969917', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1497464768}

author: {'steamid': '76561198232622752', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1496702838}
review:
This game was fun and a bit challenging! It looked a lot better than I expected and the gameplay was fast paced. You cant turn the music down or off is my only complaint really. It played pretty smooth and I had a good time playing it. Not to mention for only a buck its plenty worth it! 

Check out my video to see some gameplay:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yDgPTO8eReY

author: {'steamid': '76561198118278975', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1503917738}
review:
Когда я проходил игру, у меня вдруг возникло ощущение, что разработчик сам её не сумел пройти, но оно вскоре пропало после долгого и мучительного прохождения всех уровней. 
Я так же узнал, что покупая данную игру за 29 рублей вы получаете "День сурка", который в ютубе, например, стоит 149 руб. Ведь на 2 уровень (с окном) я потратил около 200 попыток (и кстати он самый мучительный).
Так же покупая эту игру вы получаете дополонительно игру "step", которая в свою очередь стоит за 1999 рублей.
Замечательная физика в игре просто радует глаз (нет, приступы ярости удваиваются), если чуть-чуть повернуть тележку в лево, то она улетит к ебеням и наоборот.
Не очень удачный рельеф, который так же мешает тебе достичь цели и иногда отклоняя тележку от цели немного в сторону, а там уже ничего не поделаешь, рестарт.
При поворачивании тележки, она замедляется и опять же - рестарт.
Баги-при ломании чего либо и рестарте, это что либо (будь то снеговик, принцесса или другие ломающиеся объекты) они не восстанавливаются и продолжают валяться на тех местах, где и были до рестарта.
В целом игра довольно веселая, музыка как всегда на высоте, но проходится примерно за час.

author: {'steamid': '76561198138101163', 'num_games_owned': 305, 'num_reviews': 137, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1496699247}
review:
Dirt cheap and I did laugh a bit at the rag doll silliness but I can not recommend it.

They're stating it's hard, so is the Trials series but in it you always know that you're losing due to not being good enough, in this game it about luck as you control it with the keyboard and therefore lack precise control, the camera angle is set with the mouse - it's at the wrong angle to view the road going downhill, which makes it even worse. (and after every restart it's at the same angle again)

Even how you land in the cart will make a difference and then you have to precisely hit the jump to fly in the correct angle through a window and you can't change direction midflight... (this is already at 2'nd level and I don't know how many there are as I couldn't be bothered finishing it)

This is not a hard game it's more or less pure RNG and the initial laugh gets washed away quite quickly, I wasn't expecting a masterpiece for the price but I was expecting at least a little bit of actual gameplay...

author: {'steamid': '76561198344328346', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1628257846}
review: Juego divertido, entretenido y muy barato. Recomiendo su compra. Está lleno de pequeños detalles que hacen un juego muy divertido. No es el mejor juego de la historia, pero te lo pasarás en grande. Recomendado
